capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry has an owl as a belonging. I'm quite certain about that, and I'd say it's a pretty positive sentiment - having an owl can be really cool! It's not surprising to me that he would have one, given his background in the wizarding world.

You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's belongings, and his owl is definitely one of the most iconic ones. I mean, who wouldn't want an owl as a pet? It's like having your own little companion that can fly around and deliver mail for you. I think it's really cool how Harry was able to form such a strong bond with his owl, and it's amazing how much trust he had in it to carry out important tasks.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Professor McGonagall the other day.
